summary: Increase your magical might with five new enchantments that increase the magnitude of spells. Includes dozens of leveled items and two unique and craft-able artifacts.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Reasoning[/b]
----------------------------------
I\'ve always been disappointed that the only way to increase the magnitude of spells in Skyrim is by chugging a potion. And while casting reduction is great, I always preferred casting a smaller number of more powerful spells. Which is why I created five new enchantments that magnify a spell\'s power instead of reducing casting cost.

[b]The Enchantments[/b]
----------------------------------
This mod adds five new enchantments to the game. These enchantments can be disenchanted normally and placed on any piece of equipment that allows Fortify Spell School enchantments.

[b]Magnify Alternation:[/b] Alteration spells last <mag>% longer.
[b]Magnify Conjuration:[/b] Conjuration spells last <mag>% longer.
[b]Magnify Destruction:[/b] Destruction spells are <mag>% stronger.
[b]Magnify Illusion:[/b] Illusion spells are <mag>% stronger.
[b]Magnify Restoration:[/b] Restoration spells are <mag>% stronger.

[b]The Items[/b]
----------------------------------
You can learn this enchantments from a series of necklaces that have been added to the leveled item lists. The necklaces and the level at which they appear are as follows.
1: Necklace of Minor Alteration/Conjuration/Destruction/Illusion/Restoration (12%)
8: Necklace of Alteration/Conjuration/Destruction/Illusion/Restoration (15%)
16: Necklace of Major Alteration/Conjuration/Destruction/Illusion/Restoration (17%)
24: Necklace of Eminent Alteration/Conjuration/Destruction/Illusion/Restoration (20%)
32: Necklace of Extreme Alteration/Conjuration/Destruction/Illusion/Restoration (22%)
40: Necklace of Peerless Alteration/Conjuration/Destruction/Illusion/Restoration (25%)

You can disenchant any of the above necklaces to learn the Magnify Alteration/Conjuration/Destruction/Illusion/Restoration enchantment. The base value of the enchantment is 8%.

Version 2.0 allows you to craft the basic rings at the forge. Each ring requires a filled common soul gem and a silver emerald necklace.

In addition, I have created two unique and highly powerful artifacts.
[b]Archmage Amulet:[/b] All spells cost <25>% less to cast and magicka regenerates <100>% faster.
[b]Archmage Ring:[/b] Alteration and Cojuration spells last <25>% longer. Destruction, Illusion, and Restoration spells are <25>% stronger.

Both rings can be crafted at any forge after you have completed the following five quests:
Alteration Ritual Spell
Conjuration Ritual Spell
Destruction Ritual Spell
Illusion Ritual Spell
Restoration Ritual Spell

[b]Additional Changes[/b]
----------------------------------
Because most base enchantments are considered to be Restoration effects, I had to alter them in order to balance the Magnify Restoration enchantment. This mod removes the Restoration Magic Skill from all base enchantments. All enchantments will continue to function normally, but this does mean that the Fortify Restoration potion infinite crafting loop no longer functions. I have not touched any other magical effects, however, and so you may notice that some food items and potions will be boosted.

[b]Installation[/b]
----------------------------------
1. Unzip the mod into your Skyrim/Data directory.
2. Activate Magnify Spell Enchantments.esp with your choice of mod manager.
3. Enjoy!

OR

Install automatically using the Nexus Mod Manager

[b]Version History[/b]
----------------------------------
11/15/2012 - Archmage Rings and Amulets disenchanting should now be fixed. The enchantment can now be placed on anything you could enchant with Fortify Magicka.
9/17/2012 - Made the basic necklace craftable in the forge.
9/07/2012 - Initial Release 1.0

[b]Credits[/b]
----------------------------------
Bethesda for creating the wonderful game that is Skyrim
